name: egg-bomb
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.

flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.
